turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to place a coffee order at Starbucks for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, at which Starbucks location should I place the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks located on Kings Highway in Brooklyn, NY.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a Caramel Brulee Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A grande and please have them use almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Would you like to add whipped cream to your coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have down a grande Caramel Brulee Latte with almond milk and no whipped cream. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually I think I want to try a Cherry Mocha instead.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Should I cancel the original order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, cancel the Caramel Brulee and instead order me a grande Cherry Mocha with almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, any whipped cream on top?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to add anything else before I place the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I add an 8 grain roll to my order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm sorry, it seems to be out of stock.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's too bad, what about a blueberry scone?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, blueberry scones are available. Should I add it to your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please add two.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Anything else to add to your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Placing an order at Starbucks located at Kings Highway for a grande Cherry Mocha with almond milk and no whipped cream and two blueberry scones.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been placed. A receipt has been sent to your phone via text message. Can I do anything else for you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How long will it take to be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order will be available in about 15 minutes. Can I do anything else for you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you. Goodbye.
